verses.verse: And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> all that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>, and withal how he had <S%H2026>slain<s%> all the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Then <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, So let the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me, and <S%H3254>more<s%> also, if I <S%H7760>make<s%> not thy <S%H5315>life<s%> as the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of them by to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that, he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> for his <S%H5315>life<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, which belongeth to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3240>left<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> there.

¶ But he himself <S%H1980>went<s%> a <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> under <S%H259>a<s%> juniper <S%H7574>tree<s%>: and he <S%H7592>requested<s%> for <S%H5315>himself<s%> that he might <S%H4191>die<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H7227>enough<s%>; now, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>; for I am not <S%H2896>better<s%> than my <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And as he <S%H7901>lay<s%> and <S%H3462>slept<s%> under <S%H259>a<s%> juniper <S%H7574>tree<s%>, behold, then an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And he <S%H5027>looked<s%>, and, behold, there was a <S%H5692>cake<s%> baken on the <S%H7529>coals<s%>, and a <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at his <S%H4763>head<s%>. And he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and laid him <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%>; because the <S%H1870>journey<s%> is too <S%H7227>great<s%> for thee.

And he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> in the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of that <S%H396>meat<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> unto <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H935>came<s%> thither unto a <S%H4631>cave<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there; and, behold, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to him, and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What doest thou here, <S%H452>Elijah<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have been <S%H7065>very<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> thine <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I, even I only, am <S%H3498>left<s%>; and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>, to take it <S%H3947>away<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. And, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H6561>rent<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and brake in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H5553>rocks<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not in the <S%H7307>wind<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> an <S%H7494>earthquake<s%>; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not in the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%>:

And <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%>; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not in the <S%H784>fire<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> a <S%H1827>still<s%> <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

And it was so, when <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, that he <S%H3874>wrapped<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> in his <S%H155>mantle<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the entering <S%H6607>in<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave<s%>. And, behold, there came a <S%H6963>voice<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What doest thou here, <S%H452>Elijah<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have been <S%H7065>very<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: because the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> thine <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I, even I only, am <S%H3498>left<s%>; and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>, to take it <S%H3947>away<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> on thy <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>: and when thou <S%H935>comest<s%>, <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H758>Syria<s%>:

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> shalt thou <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> of <S%H65>Abel-meholah<s%> shalt thou <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to be <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in thy room.

And it shall come to pass, that him that <S%H4422>escapeth<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> shall <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%>: and him that <S%H4422>escapeth<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> shall <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%>.

Yet I have <S%H7604>left<s%> me <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all the <S%H1290>knees<s%> which have not <S%H3766>bowed<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and every <S%H6310>mouth<s%> which hath not <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

¶ So he <S%H3212>departed<s%> thence, and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%>, who was <S%H2790>plowing<s%> with <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of oxen <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and he with the <S%H8147%H6240>twelfth<s%>: and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> his <S%H155>mantle<s%> upon him.

And he <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me, I pray thee, <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and then I will <S%H3212%H310>follow<s%> thee. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Go <S%H3212>back<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>: for what have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to thee?

And he returned <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H310>him<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H2076>slew<s%> them, and <S%H1310>boiled<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>. Then he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, and <S%H8334>ministered<s%> unto him.
